nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Brick Adventures 1: Stormtrooper Class Clowns
LEGO Star Wars: Brick Adventures 1: Stormtrooper Class Clowns is the first in a series of LEGO adventure books. It was published on June 26, 2018.

Three all-new LEGO(R) Star Wars(TM) stories with full-coolor illustrations, perfect for reluctant readers. Welcome to First Order School! This school has it all, from gym class with Kylo Ren to flying lessons with Captain Phasma. Do these recruits have what it takes to stand side by side with Supreme Leader Snoke? Or will this new class of stormtroopers flunk out?
